page.title: 16FILMING "REVOLUTION" (1)
page.content: On 8th May we went to see a film set at Burrator.Thomas Hudson's Dad is the director of the film.Mrs.Hudson arranged it so that we could go and see a stuntman and parts of the film being acted.We saw thousands of actors We even saw a little boy who was one of the drummer boys.We saw AL Pacino the star of the film. We watched two men who were supposed to be dragging George Washington.Then we talked to George Powell the man who makes things out of fibre glass.He made things in Star Wars,James Bond and thousands of other films. After we had got his autograph,we watched the same two men dragging George Washington and a pack of bloodhounds chasing them.The way they got the bloodhounds to go was to get two dead rabbits and drag them along the route.(Continued on page 17)
